name: Asteroids Millennium
description: A modern spin on an old classic! Asteroids Millennium provides exciting new game play without departing from the feel of its predecessors. Collect power-ups, dodge threats, and blast away at asteroids and enemies alike in this survival game that is truly fun to play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1GHz, 1GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.3-capable graphics card Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL-capable sound card Additional Notes: Requires an internet connection to play, to verify legal ownership
